verses.verse: Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H518>Though<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, yet my <S%H5315>mind<s%> could <S%H369>not<s%> be <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H7971>cast<s%> them out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5921><s%> my <S%H6440>sight,<s%> and let them go <S%H3318>forth.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> they <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, <S%H575>Whither<s%> shall we go <S%H3318>forth?<s%> then thou shalt <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H413><s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> Such <S%H834>as<s%> are for <S%H4194>death,<s%> to <S%H4194>death;<s%> and such <S%H834>as<s%> are for the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and such <S%H834>as<s%> are for the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> to the <S%H7458>famine;<s%> and such <S%H834>as<s%> are for the <S%H7628>captivity,<s%> to the <S%H7628>captivity.<s%>

And I will <S%H6485>appoint<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4940>kinds,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> to <S%H2026>slay,<s%> and the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> to <S%H5498>tear,<s%> and the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> to <S%H398>devour<s%> and <S%H7843>destroy.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>cause<s%> them to be <S%H2189>removed<s%> into <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> because <S%H1558>of<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> shall have <S%H2550>pity<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem?<s%> or <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H5110>bemoan<s%> thee? or <S%H4310>who<s%> shall go <S%H5493>aside<s%> to <S%H7592>ask<s%> how thou <S%H7965>doest?<s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> hast <S%H5203>forsaken<s%> me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> thou art <S%H1980>gone<s%> <S%H268>backward:<s%> therefore will I stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee, and <S%H7843>destroy<s%> thee; I am <S%H3811>weary<s%> with <S%H5162>repenting.<s%>

And I will <S%H2219>fan<s%> them with a <S%H4214>fan<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> I will <S%H7921>bereave<s%> them of children, I will <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> since they <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> from their <S%H4480>ways.<s%> <S%H1870><s%>

Their <S%H490>widows<s%> are <S%H6105>increased<s%> to me above the <S%H4480>sand<s%> <S%H2344><s%> of the <S%H3220>seas:<s%> I have <S%H935>brought<s%> upon them <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H517>mother<s%> of the young <S%H970>men<s%> a <S%H7703>spoiler<s%> at <S%H6672>noonday:<s%> I have caused him to <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it <S%H6597>suddenly,<s%> and <S%H928>terrors<s%> upon the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

She that hath <S%H3205>borne<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H535>languisheth:<s%> she hath given <S%H5301>up<s%> the <S%H5315>ghost;<s%> her <S%H8121>sun<s%> is gone <S%H935>down<s%> <S%H5750>while<s%> it was yet <S%H3119>day:<s%> she hath been <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H2659>confounded:<s%> and the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of them will I <S%H5414>deliver<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Woe <S%H188><s%> is me, my <S%H517>mother,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou hast <S%H3205>borne<s%> me a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H7379>strife<s%> and a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4066>contention<s%> to the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth!<s%> I have <S%H3808>neither<s%> lent on <S%H5383>usury,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> men have lent to me on <S%H5383>usury;<s%> yet every <S%H3605>one<s%> of them doth <S%H7043>curse<s%> me.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>Verily<s%> <S%H3808><s%> it shall be <S%H2896>well<s%> with thy <S%H7611>remnant;<s%> <S%H518>verily<s%> <S%H3808><s%> I will <S%H853>cause<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%> to <S%H6293>entreat<s%> thee well in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%> and in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>affliction.<s%>
Shall <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H7489>break<s%> the <S%H4480>northern<s%> <S%H6828><s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%> and the <S%H5178>steel?<s%>

Thy <S%H2428>substance<s%> and thy <S%H214>treasures<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H957>spoil<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H4242>price,<s%> and that for <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H2403>sins,<s%> even in <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H1366>borders.<s%>

And I will make thee to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> into a <S%H776>land<s%> which thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H3808>not:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> is <S%H6919>kindled<s%> in mine <S%H639>anger,<s%> which shall <S%H3344>burn<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you.

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H3045>knowest:<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> me, and <S%H6485>visit<s%> me, and <S%H5358>revenge<s%> me of my <S%H4480>persecutors;<s%> <S%H7291><s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> me <S%H408>not<s%> away in thy <S%H750>longsuffering:<s%> <S%H639><s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H5921>for<s%> thy sake I have <S%H5375>suffered<s%> <S%H2781>rebuke.<s%>

Thy <S%H1697>words<s%> were <S%H4672>found,<s%> and I did <S%H398>eat<s%> them; and thy <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> unto me the <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H8057>rejoicing<s%> of mine <S%H3824>heart:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I am <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

I <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in the <S%H5475>assembly<s%> of the <S%H7832>mockers,<s%> nor <S%H5937>rejoiced;<s%> I <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H910>alone<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of thy <S%H3027>hand:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou hast <S%H4390>filled<s%> me with <S%H2195>indignation.<s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> my <S%H3511>pain<s%> <S%H5331>perpetual,<s%> and my <S%H4347>wound<s%> <S%H605>incurable,<s%> which <S%H3985>refuseth<s%> to be <S%H7495>healed?<s%> wilt thou be <S%H1961>altogether<s%> <S%H1961><s%> unto me <S%H3644>as<s%> a <S%H391>liar,<s%> and as <S%H4325>waters<s%> that <S%H3808>fail?<s%> <S%H539><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> thou <S%H7725>return,<s%> then will I bring thee <S%H7725>again,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me: and <S%H518>if<s%> thou take <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H3368>precious<s%> from the <S%H4480>vile,<s%> <S%H2151><s%> thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> as my <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> let them <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee; but <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them.

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> thee unto <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> a <S%H1219>fenced<s%> <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H2346>wall:<s%> and they shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> thee, but they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3201>prevail<s%> against thee: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H854>with<s%> thee to <S%H3467>save<s%> thee and to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> thee out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H7451>wicked,<s%> and I will <S%H6299>redeem<s%> thee out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3709><s%> of the <S%H6184>terrible.<s%>
